metadata.name: Suspicious Microsoft Office Child Process - MacOS
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious child processes spawning from microsoft office suite applications such as word or excel. This could indicates malicious macro execution

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('microsoft word')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('microsoft excel')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('microsoft powerpoint')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('microsoft onenote'))) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/bash')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/curl')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/dash')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/fish')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/osacompile')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/osascript')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/sh')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/zsh')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/python')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/python3')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/wget'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious child processes spawning from microsoft office suite applications such as word or excel. This could indicates malicious macro execution
